category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_enable_AncestorMapping
preference.preference_description: This is an optional preference. It enables ancestor mapping. This adds the node XML interpretations of all the BOMline ancestors of BOMlines to CAE Structure Maps in the CAE Manager application. Valid Values: 1 - Ancestor mapping is enabled. 0 - Ancestor mapping is not enabled.
